caption: Merge All PDFs using
doc: Merge the entirety of a list of PDFs together.

ABN.caption: Merge all PDFs by supplying a list of their URLs. Use Bubble's :filtered and :sorted to arrange the list into your desired order.
ABN.name: info

ABQ.caption: Filename
ABQ.doc: Name to give your file WITHOUT THE .PDF EXTENSION.
ABQ.name: filename
